Alternate PyDiceroll Distributions¶

Often times, the PyDiceroll module is found in other formats. You may already have a copy of PyDiceroll that was distributed with another program you’re using.

Besides its common .py format, PyDiceroll can be found in a .pyd format as well. This format is packaged as a dynamic link library, and will work the same way as the .py format. The format is typically bundled with the software that was designed for using it.

Warning

The .pyd format can only be imported and will not execute at a CMD prompt.
